amendment.description: To make effective the proposed rule of the Food and Drug Administration relating to sunscreen drug products.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2126 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2126 proposed by Senator Harkin for Senator Reed. (consideration: CR S3506-3507; text: CR S3506-3507) To make effective the proposed rule of the Food and Drug Administration relating to sunscreen drug products.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2126 proposed by Senator Harkin for Senator Reed.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2126 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
